entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
